clue: Noble title of Glamis, Cawdor, Lochaber — and more becoming than Earl
explanation: "Noble title of Glamis, Cawdor, Lochaber — and more" is THANE, evoking Macbeth, and becoming "THAN Earl (E)", which gives the same answer.
hints: Sometimes a word that looks like part of the surface is actually the join between definition and wordplay. That's true here.
The opening list points to a specific noble title, strongly associated with a Shakespeare tragedy.
Read this clue as: [definition] becoming [wordplay]. Both sides lead to the same answer.
